song_lyrics: Me to grahī līdhu sharaṇu tamāru re Yogī,
Evī mūrti manohar tamārī re Yogī... karī 1
E to dhabbāmā Dhām pamāḍe re Yogī... karī 2
Swāmīnī pāse ame eṭlu ja magīe,
Tav charaṇomā lyone svīkārī re Yogī... karī 3
title: Me to grahī līdhu sharaṇu tamāru re Yogī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-1000: unknown

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
